name: A WashingtonPost Darkly
description: Dark styles for WashingtonPost. See "Advanced Style Settings" for more color themes. Screenshots of themes: https://imgur.com/a/eOYbC
additional_info:
2020-05-29: Minor fixes to colors.
2019-06-07: Minor fixes to some colors.
2018-10-06: Fixes for latest changes to wapo website.
2018-08-29: Fix dark comments. Added ArcDark & Dracula.
2018-07-19: Fixed styles on comments, page elements.
2018-05-25: Updated to fix dark text in headlines/articles
v1.4: Small tweaks to ugly styles (random black text or white backgrounds)
v1.3: Supporting new article types.
v1.2: Fix more articles.
v1.1: Fix articles with annotations / transcriptions.
v1.0: First release.

discussions.name: Article comment box backgrounds are bright
Articles like this page appear to have dark text
Those main graphical articles again with dark text
